Apita Bus,train pawa apema kiyala hadanna puluwan.kochchara adambarada Eka.pita ratata yanna salli ithuruth wewi. Rate ape karmantha shala hadewi. Rakiya labewi.elbert einsteinla innawa ape rate mathiduni. Owunta idiriyata enna baha.rate ehema awastha naha. Prayojanayak ganne naha. Pitaratawala maha ihalin piliganna ape buddimathun ape ratata awama sathekata piliganeemak naha.mona aparadayakda.owunwa prayojanayata ganne anith Ratawal.ayojana walata uparima sahana denna mathiduni.nayak gaththoth erst wada Poli bara. Adaryamath wena widiyatane thiyenne. Rakiya kochchara hadanna puluwanda.ane wadakarakamara ape ganu yawanna one naha.sampath pirunu ratak me.manawa sampathth Ekka.servent County wela me gambeera ratak mathiduni.pitaratawala inna ugathunuth ewi. Owungen rata prayojana gannawa nam,awasthawa denawa nam.ane amanushika komis Kutti nawathwanna. Ee nisa ayojana harila yana 1 nawathwanna.ape hela waydya kramaya,naga situwanna.
